description: Starting at the Chateau Lake Louise you head up a well marked trail towards the Lake Agnes teahouse. On the way stop at Mirror Lake for a picture. Once you reach the Teahouse continue on to Little Behive to get a beautiful view of the entire valley from the peak. Heading down the mountain on a different path provides even more views of Lake Louise below.
directions: Follow the road marks to Chateau Lake Louise and park in public parking (Park pass required). Trail head is on Lake Louise behind the Chateau
title: Lake Agnes - Little Beehive
